tool.name: Atlas import: get classifiers
tool.description: Import pre-trained classifiers and SDRF files for a range of studies from Single Cell Expression Atlas
tool.command:
import_classification_data.R --tool "${tool}" --classifiers-output-dir "${classifier_output_dir}"
#if $config_file --config-file "${config_file}" #end if #if $get_sdrf --get-sdrf "${get_sdrf}" #end if #if $condensed_sdrf --condensed-sdrf "${condensed_sdrf}" #end if #if $sdrf_output_dir --sdrf-output-dir "${sdrf_output_dir}" #end if #if $get_tool_perf_table --get-tool-perf-table "${get_tool_perf_table}" #end if #if $tool_perf_table_output_path --tool-perf-table-output-path "${tool_perf_table_output_path}" #end if

param.name: tool
param.label: Tool
param.help: For which tool should the classifiers be imported?

param.name: import_sdrf_files
param.label: Import SDRF files for the given experiments?
param.help: If specified, SDRF files will also be imported

param.name: condensed_sdrf
param.label: Import condensed version of SDRF files?
param.help: Should condensed SDRF files be imported? By default, normal version is imported.
